list.name: Changes
list.comment: Refactored the Rock, Paper, Scissors game into a modular structure. Split the code into two separate files: a functions file (RSPF.py) and a main program file. The functions handling user input, computer selection, and game logic were moved to the functions file. The main program imports these functions to manage the game loop and flow. This enhances code readability, modularity, and maintainability.

This enhances code readability, modularity, and maintainability.
